articles.title: Trudeau not sold on exporting liquefied natural gas to Europe - CTV News
articles.description: Pitching Canada as a reliable supplier of clean energy and a solution for European countries' reliance on Russian oil and gas, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau says he's not sold on the idea of liquefied natural gas exports being part of the long-term plan.
